resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74234</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660d-11c0-4015-2deb-8aabc217f035#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Trónoló Krisztus, a Godescalc-evangelistariumból, 781-783, Biblioth?que Nationale, Párizs, miniatúra.</string>
            <string language="en">Christ Enthroned, from the Godescalc Evangelistary, 781-783, Bibliotheque Nationale, Paris, miniature.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Christ inthronisierte, vom Godescalc 
Evangelistary, 781-783, Bibliotheque Nationale, Paris, Mini.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Christ couronné, du Godescalc Evangelistary, 
781-783, Bibliotheque Nationale, Paris, miniature.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Christ enthroned, do Godescalc Evangelistary, 
781-783, Bibliotheque Nationale, Paris, diminuta.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Christ enthroned, dal Godescalc Evangelistary, 
781-783, Bibliotheque Nationale, Parigi, miniatura.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χριστός Enthroned, από το Godescalc 
Evangelistary, 781-783, Bibliotheque Nationale, Παρίσι, 
μικροσκοπικό.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cristo enthroned, del Godescalc Evangelistary, 
781-783, Bibliotheque Nationale, París, miniatura.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Krisztus, kezében könyvvel, hosszú hajjal ábrázolva egy pergamenre festett miniatúrán.</string>
            <string language="en">Christ with book in his hand and with long hair representing on a miniature painted on parchment</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">kódexfestés,  Nemzeti Könyvtár,  Párizs,  kódexfestészet,  Godescalc sriptor.,  Godescalc-evangelistarium,  evangelistarium,  </string>
            <string language="en">codex painting, National Library, Paris, Godescalc sriptor., Godescalc Evangelistary, evangelistary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Christ mit Buch in seiner Hand und mit dem langen Haar, 
das auf einer Miniatur gemalt auf Pergament darstellt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Christ avec le livre dans sa main et avec de longs 
cheveux représentant sur une miniature peinte sur le parchemin</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Christ com o livro em sua mão e com o cabelo longo que 
representa em uma miniatura pintada no parchment</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Christ con il libro in sua mano e con capelli lunghi che 
rappresentano su una miniatura verniciata su pergamena</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χριστός με το βιβλίο στο χέρι του και με τη μακριά 
τρίχα που αντιπροσωπεύει σε μια μικρογραφία που χρωματίζεται στην 
περγαμηνή</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cristo con el libro en su mano y con el pelo largo que 
representa en una miniatura pintada en el pergamino</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kodexanstrich, nationale Bibliothek, Paris, Godescalc 
sriptor., Godescalc Evangelistary, evangelistary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">peinture de codex, bibliothèque nationale, Paris, 
Godescalc sriptor., Godescalc Evangelistary, evangelistary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pintura do codex, biblioteca nacional, Paris, Godescalc
sriptor., Godescalc Evangelistary, evangelistary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pittura del codice, libreria nazionale, Parigi, Godescalc
sriptor., Godescalc Evangelistary, evangelistary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ζωγραφική κωδίκων, εθνική βιβλιοθήκη, Παρίσι, Godescalc 
sriptor., Godescalc Evangelistary, evangelistary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pintura del códice, biblioteca nacional, París, 
Godescalc sriptor., Godescalc Evangelistary, evangelistary</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

version:3.0
n:;

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

        org:Sulinet

      </lom>
    </metadata>
